desc.cn: 一个 GitHub (gh) CLI 扩展，用于显示一个仪表板，展示根据你关心的过滤条件筛选出的拉取请求和问题。
desc.en: A GitHub (gh) CLI extension to display a dashboard with pull requests and issues by filters you care about.

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew install gh && \
gh extension install dlvhdr/gh-dash

darwin/port.cmd:
sudo port install gh && \
gh extension install dlvhdr/gh-dash

/curl.cmd:
curl -sS https://webi.sh/gh | sh && \
gh extension install dlvhdr/gh-dash

(win|wsl2)/winget.cmd:
x winget install --id GitHub.cli && \
gh extension install dlvhdr/gh-dash

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop install gh && \
gh extension install dlvhdr/gh-dash

(win|wsl2)/choco.cmd:
x choco install gh && \
gh extension install dlvhdr/gh-dash
